name: Lightrunner
description:
This is a project for Integrated Game Studio (IGS) made by Team "5 Guys, 1 Game" from Lawrence Technological University (LTU) located in Southfield, MI.

Controls: WASD to move, Space to jump, and E to interact.

The game revolves around the idea that light is a 100% necessity in order to avoid instantaneous death. The goal is to use the lights in each level to guide your character through to the exit, where the cycle will start again.
